ValidationRule.description: Min & Max should build a valid range
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: NOT ( AND ( (vlocity_cmt__MinQuantity__c <= vlocity_cmt__MaxQuantity__c),( vlocity_cmt__DefaultQuantity__c <= vlocity_cmt__MaxQuantity__c),( vlocity_cmt__DefaultQuantity__c >= vlocity_cmt__MinQuantity__c)) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Min Quantity should be less than or equal to Max Quantity And Default Quantity should be in between Min & Max Quantity
